nodes.text: The Skelda clan were a Clan of Beast Riders native to Onderon. The group consisted of at least twelve members.

In 1000 BBY, Darth Zannah crash landed the Star-Wake in Skelda territory. As a result, she was almost ambushed and her ship stolen, but Darth Bane dropped in from the atmosphere and fought the Skelda clan atop a mount of his own. In the end, Bane defeated all twelve members of the clan, plus their four mounts.
